title: Associations of maternal and personal smoking with all-cause and cause-specific mortality risk and life expectancy: a prospective cohort study
content:
Publication date: April 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 229

Author(s): Linmin Hu, Siqing Wu, Yunhui Zhang, Xuedan Xia, Yuelong Shu, Qiangsheng He, Huang Manshan, Zicong Kuo, Yingya Zhao, Pengpeng Wang, Yanfei Li, Chunliang Wang, Kai Su, Hengyi Han, Jinqiu Yuan, Jianbang Xiang, Bin Xia
